Darkfate::

"That's sounds good" said the dragon and though "And that means 
troubles, too"

"I'm interesting to speak about" said the dragon "Are you free to act 
or have I to wait that your leader has time to speak about? "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Perndabot::
> 
> Perndabot looks down at Darkfate as the Predacon commander lands. 
> Perndabot was used to looking down at bots. To his knowledge, he 
was 
> the tallest bot on the planet, although in reality there were a few 
> who were taller. Perndabot was 15 feet tall, a fuze of two Maximals 
> and thereby having two fully operational sparks. Other than that, 
> however, everything had been redone by the Alliance, right down to 
> his programming. Before he was tamed (he had gone insane after the 
> accidental fuze), he had been a completely wild bot, and it had 
taken 
> the combined efforts of most of the Alliance and Maximals (which 
were 
> both small factions at the time) to restrain him.
> 
> "Yes," he replies to Darkfate's question, "Zardus thinks it would 
be 
> benificial to both factions if we allied. He would be here himself, 
> but the Alliance just got back from a battle and there are things 
> than need to be done back at the base."
> 
> His mission wasn't all or nothing. As long as any sort of good will 
> was established between the Alliance and the Predacons, Zardus 
would 
> probably be happy.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Darkfate/7 batprobes::
> > 
> > 
> > Darkfate landed in robot mode, several feet of Pernabot. 6 of the 
7 
> > bat probes spread in several diferent directions and they lost in 
> the 
> > distance. One landed in Darkfate's arm.
> > 
> > "So, does Zardus want to make a deal with me?"
